title: As Charter Schools Become Divisive, Two Parents Give Their Take
text:
As Charter Schools Become Divisive, Two Parents Give Their Take 
Published By: WGBH - Today 
It used to be a given: When your kids reached school age, they'd strap on their backpacks and head for the neighborhood elementary school. O...
